Mouse pad as a desk organizer: Use the mouse pad as a flat surface to organize small items like pens, paper clips, and other desk accessories.
Mouse pad as a coaster: Place a glass or cup on top of the mouse pad to prevent it from slipping and spilling.
Mouse pad as a footrest: Use the mouse pad as a footrest to elevate your feet while you work.
Mouse pad as a stress ball: Fold the mouse pad into a ball shape and use it as a stress ball to squeeze and relieve tension.
Mouse pad as a desk mat: Use the mouse pad as a desk mat to protect your desk surface from scratches and scuffs.
